channel.description: Recent content in Coldplay on djvelimir.github.io

item.title: Paradise
item.description: When she was just a girl she expected the world But it flew away from her reach So she ran away in her sleep Dreamed of para-para-paradise Para-para-paradise, para-para-paradise Every time she closed her eyes When she was just a girl she expected the world But it flew away from her reach And the bullets catch in her teeth Life goes on, it gets so heavy The wheel breaks the butterfly
